2072.subject: MATH
2072.descrlong: Build on knowledge of algebra using algebraic, graphical, and geometric reasoning to recognize patterns and structure, model information, and solve problems from various disciplines. Students use data from experiments; translate physical phenomena into equations; and analyze, solve, present, and interpret qualitative and numerical solutions. Students use a variety of representations, tools, and technologies to link modeling techniques and purely mathematical concepts, and to solve applied problems.  (Offered when enrollment warrants.)
